TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi RegistryProxy extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供屬性和方法，以操作登錄。

span.span: Provides properties and methods for manipulating the registry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用這些屬性，您必須擁有讀取和寫入權限從列舉型別。To use these properties, you must have Read and Write permission from the enumeration. 以完全信任執行的任何程式碼 （在預設的安全性原則，這是安裝在使用者的本機硬碟上的任何程式碼） 具有存取登錄的必要權限。Any code running with full trust (under the default security policy, this is any code installed on the user's local hard drive) has the necessary permissions to access the registry. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class. 下表列出包含工作的範例`My.Computer.Registry`物件。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Registry` object. |以To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |建立登錄機碼，並設定其值Create a registry key and set its value|[如何：建立登錄機碼並設定其值How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)| |刪除登錄機碼Delete a registry key|[如何：刪除登錄機碼How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)| |從登錄讀取資料Read data from the registry|[如何：讀取登錄機碼的值How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)| ## Examples 這個範例會讀取值`Name`從`HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\MyApp`並將它顯示在訊息方塊。This example reads the value `Name` from `HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\MyApp` and displays it in a message box. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#8)]

span.span: Returns a type which provides access to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT` 主要用來儲存在 Windows 檔案關聯的相關資訊。`HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT` is primarily used to store information about file associations in Windows. 類別，這是在命名空間、 控制登錄變數的存取權。The class, which is in the namespace, controls access to registry variables. 您不應將登錄變數儲存在記憶體位置，因為不具備 的程式碼亦可存取這個位置。Registry variables should not be stored in memory locations where code without can access them. 同樣地，當授與權限，只有這些權限授與完成工作所需。Similarly, when granting permissions, grant only those privileges necessary to get the job done. 登錄權限存取值是由 列舉定義。Registry permission access values are defined by the enumeration. 下表會詳細說明其成員。The following table details its members. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |AllAccessAllAccess|建立、 讀取和寫入存取登錄變數。Create, read, and write access to registry variables.| |建立Create|建立登錄變數的存取權限。Create access to registry variables.| |NoAccessNoAccess|不允許存取登錄變數。No access to registry variables.| |讀取Read|登錄變數的讀取存取。Read access to registry variables.| |WriteWrite|登錄變數的寫入存取。Write access to registry variables.| 下表列出包含工作的範例`My.Computer.Registry`物件。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Registry` object. |以To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |建立登錄機碼，並設定其值Create a registry key and set its value|[如何：建立登錄機碼並設定其值How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)| |刪除登錄機碼Delete a registry key|[如何：刪除登錄機碼How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)| |讀取登錄機碼的值Read a value from a registry key|[如何：讀取登錄機碼的值How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)| ## Examples 這個範例會取得名稱的子機碼的`ClassesRoot`登錄機碼並將其加入`ListBox1`。This example gets the names of the subkeys for the `ClassesRoot` registry key and adds them to `ListBox1`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#10)] 這個範例需要您有`ListBox`名為`ListBox1`專案中。This example requires that you have a `ListBox` named `ListBox1` in your project.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG` 主要用來在電腦上儲存裝置的設定。`HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG` is primarily used to store settings for devices on the computer. 類別，這是在命名空間、 控制登錄變數的存取權。The class, which is in the namespace, controls access to registry variables. 您不應將登錄變數儲存在記憶體位置，因為不具備 的程式碼亦可存取這個位置。Registry variables should not be stored in memory locations where code without can access them. 同樣地，當授與權限，只有這些權限授與完成工作所需。Similarly, when granting permissions, grant only those privileges necessary to get the job done. 登錄權限存取值是由 列舉定義。Registry permission access values are defined by the enumeration. 下表會詳細說明其成員。The following table details its members. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |AllAccessAllAccess|建立、 讀取和寫入存取登錄變數。Create, read, and write access to registry variables.| |建立Create|建立登錄變數的存取權限。Create access to registry variables.| |NoAccessNoAccess|不允許存取登錄變數。No access to registry variables.| |讀取Read|登錄變數的讀取存取。Read access to registry variables.| |WriteWrite|登錄變數的寫入存取。Write access to registry variables.| 下表列出包含工作的範例`My.Computer.Registry`物件。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Registry` object. |以To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |建立登錄機碼，並設定其值Create a registry key and set its value|[如何：建立登錄機碼並設定其值How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)| |刪除登錄機碼Delete a registry key|[如何：刪除登錄機碼How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)| |讀取登錄機碼的值Read a value from a registry key|[如何：讀取登錄機碼的值How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)| ## Examples 這個範例會建立子機碼`MyDeviceSettings`。This example creates the subkey `MyDeviceSettings`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `HKEY_CURRENT_USER` 主要用來儲存每個使用者設定，例如色彩和字型，在 Windows 中。`HKEY_CURRENT_USER` is primarily used to store per-user settings, such as colors and fonts, in Windows. 索引鍵會因使用者而異。The key differ according to the user. 類別，這是在命名空間、 控制登錄變數的存取權。The class, which is in the namespace, controls access to registry variables. 您不應將登錄變數儲存在記憶體位置，因為不具備 的程式碼亦可存取這個位置。Registry variables should not be stored in memory locations where code without can access them. 同樣地，當授與權限，授與完成工作所需的最低權限。Similarly, when granting permissions, grant the fewest privileges necessary to get the job done. 登錄權限存取值是由 列舉定義。Registry permission access values are defined by the enumeration. 下表會詳細說明其成員。The following table details its members. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |AllAccessAllAccess|建立、 讀取和寫入存取登錄變數。Create, read, and write access to registry variables.| |建立Create|建立登錄變數的存取權限。Create access to registry variables.| |NoAccessNoAccess|不允許存取登錄變數。No access to registry variables.| |讀取Read|登錄變數的讀取存取。Read access to registry variables.| |WriteWrite|登錄變數的寫入存取。Write access to registry variables.| 下表列出包含工作的範例`My.Computer.Registry`物件。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Registry` object. |以To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |建立登錄機碼，並設定其值Create a registry key and set its value|[如何：建立登錄機碼並設定其值How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)| |刪除登錄機碼Delete a registry key|[如何：刪除登錄機碼How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)| |讀取登錄機碼的值Read a value from a registry key|[如何：讀取登錄機碼的值How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)| ## Examples 這個範例會刪除子機碼`Software\MyCompany\Preferences\UserData`。This example deletes the subkey `Software\MyCompany\Preferences\UserData`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `HKEY_DYNDATA` 用來儲存動態登錄資料，例如使用的虛擬裝置驅動程式，並支援只能在 Windows 95/98 系統上。`HKEY_DYNDATA` is used to store dynamic registry data, such as that used by Virtual Device Drivers and is supported only on Windows 95/98 systems. 在非 Windows 95/98 系統上呼叫任何方法所傳回之金鑰的`Registry.DynData`，例如`CreateSubKey`， `DeleteSubKey`， `GetSubKeyCount`，`GetValueCount`等等，將會擲回。On non-Windows 95/98 systems, calling any methods of the key returned by `Registry.DynData`, such as `CreateSubKey`, `DeleteSubKey`, `GetSubKeyCount`, `GetValueCount`, etc., will throw a . 類別，這是在命名空間、 控制登錄變數的存取權。The class, which is in the namespace, controls access to registry variables. 您不應將登錄變數儲存在記憶體位置，因為不具備 的程式碼亦可存取這個位置。Registry variables should not be stored in memory locations where code without can access them. 同樣地，當授與權限，授與完成工作所需的最低權限。Similarly, when granting permissions, grant the fewest privileges necessary to get the job done. 登錄權限存取值是由 列舉定義。Registry permission access values are defined by the enumeration. 下表會詳細說明其成員。The following table details its members. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |AllAccessAllAccess|建立、 讀取和寫入存取登錄變數。Create, read, and write access to registry variables.| |建立Create|建立登錄變數的存取權限。Create access to registry variables.| |NoAccessNoAccess|不允許存取登錄變數。No access to registry variables.| |讀取Read|登錄變數的讀取存取。Read access to registry variables.| |WriteWrite|登錄變數的寫入存取。Write access to registry variables.| 下表列出包含工作的範例`My.Computer.Registry`物件。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Registry` object. |以To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |建立登錄機碼，並設定其值Create a registry key and set its value|[如何：建立登錄機碼並設定其值How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)| |刪除登錄機碼Delete a registry key|[如何：刪除登錄機碼How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)| |讀取登錄機碼的值Read a value from a registry key|[如何：讀取登錄機碼的值How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)| ## Examples 這個範例會刪除子機碼樹狀結構`Software\MyCompany\Preferences`。This example deletes the subkey tree `Software\MyCompany\Preferences`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public object GetValue (string keyName, string valueName, object defaultValue);
.method public instance object GetValue(string keyName, string valueName, object defaultValue) cil managed
Public Function GetValue (keyName As String, valueName As String, defaultValue As Object) As Object
public: System::Object ^ GetValue(System::String ^ keyName, System::String ^ valueName, System::Object ^ defaultValue);

param.name: keyName
param.span: 要從中擷取值的索引鍵。

span.span: Key from which the value is to be retrieved.
Required.
Value to be retrieved.
Required.

param.name: defaultValue
param.span: 當值不存在時要提供的預設值。

span.span: Default value to be supplied if the value does not exist.
Required.
Gets a value from a registry key.
Gets a value from a registry key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `valueName` 不區分大小寫。`valueName` is not case-sensitive. 登錄機碼可以包含一個不是任何名稱相關聯的值。A registry key can contain one value that is not associated with any name. 當這個未命名的值顯示在登錄編輯程式中時，字串 「 （預設） 」 會顯示而不是名稱。When this unnamed value is displayed in the registry editor, the string "(Default)" appears instead of a name. 若要擷取這個未命名的值，指定 null 或空字串 ("") 的`valueName`。To retrieve this unnamed value, specify either null or the empty string ("") for `valueName`. 下表列出包含工作的範例`GetValue`方法。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `GetValue` method. |以To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |讀取登錄機碼的值Read a value from a registry key|[如何：讀取登錄機碼的值How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)| ## Examples 這個範例會讀取值`Name`從`HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\MyApp`並顯示在`MessageBox`。This example reads the value `Name` from `HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\MyApp` and displays it in a `MessageBox`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#9)]

exception.span: 使用者沒有讀取登錄機碼所需的使用權限。

span.span: The user does not have the permissions required to read from the registry key.

exception.span: 包含指定值的 已標記為刪除。

span.span: The that contains the specified value has been marked for deletion.

exception.span: 不是以有效的登錄根目錄開頭。

span.span: does not begin with a valid registry root.
to read from the registry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE` 通常用來儲存不會在 Windows 中改變使用者的設定。`HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE` is usually used to store settings that do not vary from user to user in Windows. 電腦的所有使用者都共用這個機碼。All users of the computer share this key. 五個子機碼 (`Hardware`， `SAM`， `Security`， `Software`，和`System`) 保存在本機電腦的組態資料。Its five subkeys (`Hardware`, `SAM`, `Security`, `Software`, and `System`) hold configuration data for the local machine. 類別，這是在命名空間、 控制登錄變數的存取權。The class, which is in the namespace, controls access to registry variables. 您不應將登錄變數儲存在記憶體位置，因為不具備 的程式碼亦可存取這個位置。Registry variables should not be stored in memory locations where code without can access them. 同樣地，當授與權限，授與完成工作所需的最低權限。Similarly, when granting permissions, grant the fewest privileges necessary to get the job done. 登錄權限存取值是由 列舉定義。Registry permission access values are defined by the enumeration. 下表會詳細說明其成員。The following table details its members. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |AllAccessAllAccess|建立、 讀取和寫入存取登錄變數。Create, read, and write access to registry variables.| |建立Create|建立登錄變數的存取權限。Create access to registry variables.| |NoAccessNoAccess|不允許存取登錄變數。No access to registry variables.| |讀取Read|登錄變數的讀取存取。Read access to registry variables.| |WriteWrite|登錄變數的寫入存取。Write access to registry variables.| 下表列出包含工作的範例`My.Computer.Registry`物件。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Registry` object. |以To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |建立登錄機碼，並設定其值Create a registry key and set its value|[如何：建立登錄機碼並設定其值How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)| |刪除登錄機碼Delete a registry key|[如何：刪除登錄機碼How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)| |讀取登錄機碼的值Read a value from a registry key|[如何：讀取登錄機碼的值How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)| ## Examples 這個範例會開啟子機碼`Software\MyCompany\Preferences`和設定的值`FontColor`至`"red"`。This example opens the subkey `Software\MyCompany\Preferences` and sets the value `FontColor` to `"red"`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 傳回 型別，此型別可提供 的存取。

span.span: Returns a type, which provides access to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA` 用來存取軟體元件的效能資訊。`HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA` is used to access performance information for software components. 安裝和執行時，這會將計數器資料時，每個軟體元件會建立其物件和計數器的機碼。Each software component creates keys for its objects and counters when it is installed and writes counter data while it is executing. 這項資料不會儲存在登錄中，不過登錄用來存取它。This data is not stored in the registry, although the registry is used to access it. 相反地，呼叫登錄函式，透過`HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA`會使系統從適當的系統物件管理員收集的資料。Instead, calling registry functions via `HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA` causes the system to collect the data from the appropriate system object managers. 這個索引鍵不存在於 Windows 98 系統。嘗試使用不呼叫`Name`方法會擲回。This key does not exist on Windows 98 systems; an attempt to use it other than calling the `Name` method will throw an . 此機碼通常無法寫入。嘗試在其上建立子機碼將會擲回。This key cannot normally be written to; attempting to create a subkey on it will throw an . 類別，這是在命名空間、 控制登錄變數的存取權。The class, which is in the namespace, controls access to registry variables. 您不應將登錄變數儲存在記憶體位置，因為不具備 的程式碼亦可存取這個位置。Registry variables should not be stored in memory locations where code without can access them. 同樣地，當授與權限，授與完成工作所需的最低權限。Similarly, when granting permissions, grant the fewest privileges necessary to get the job done. 登錄權限存取值是由 列舉定義。Registry permission access values are defined by the enumeration. 下表會詳細說明其成員。The following table details its members. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |AllAccessAllAccess|建立、 讀取和寫入存取登錄變數。Create, read, and write access to registry variables.| |建立Create|建立登錄變數的存取權限。Create access to registry variables.| |NoAccessNoAccess|不允許存取登錄變數。No access to registry variables.| |讀取Read|登錄變數的讀取存取。Read access to registry variables.| |WriteWrite|登錄變數的寫入存取。Write access to registry variables.| 下表列出包含工作的範例`My.Computer.Registry`物件。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Registry` object. |以To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |建立登錄機碼，並設定其值Create a registry key and set its value|[如何：建立登錄機碼並設定其值How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)| |刪除登錄機碼Delete a registry key|[如何：刪除登錄機碼How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)| |讀取登錄機碼的值Read a value from a registry key|[如何：讀取登錄機碼的值How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)| ## Examples 這個範例會取得值`ThisSoftware`從`MyCompany`子機碼。This example gets the value `ThisSoftware` from the `MyCompany` subkey. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#7)]

summary.span: 將值寫入至登錄機碼中。

summary.span: 將值寫入至登錄機碼中。

span.span: Writes a value to a registry key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的索引鍵或值不存在，則會建立它。If the specified key or value does not exist, it is created. 以下是範例工作涉及`My.Computer.Registry.SetValue`方法。Here is an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.Registry.SetValue` method. |以To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |設定登錄機碼中的值Set a value in a registry key|[如何：建立登錄機碼並設定其值How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)| ## Examples 此範例中設定的值`FontColor`為"red"索引鍵中`HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\MyCompany\Preferences`。This example sets the value `FontColor` to "red" in the key `HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\MyCompany\Preferences`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的索引鍵或值不存在，則會建立它。If the specified key or value does not exist, it is created. 以下是範例工作涉及`My.Computer.Registry.SetValue`方法。Here is an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.Registry.SetValue` method. |以To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |設定登錄機碼中的值Set a value in a registry key|[如何：建立登錄機碼並設定其值How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)| ## Examples 此範例中設定的值`FontColor`為"red"索引鍵中`HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\MyCompany\Preferences`。This example sets the value `FontColor` to "red" in the key `HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\MyCompany\Preferences`. remarks.format: ## Remarks `HKEY_USERS` 主要用來儲存第一次使用者的預設設定。`HKEY_USERS` is primarily used to store default settings for first-time users. 類別，這是在命名空間、 控制登錄變數的存取權。The class, which is in the namespace, controls access to registry variables. 您不應將登錄變數儲存在記憶體位置，因為不具備 的程式碼亦可存取這個位置。Registry variables should not be stored in memory locations where code without can access them. 同樣地，當授與權限，授與完成工作所需的最低權限。Similarly, when granting permissions, grant the fewest privileges necessary to get the job done. 登錄權限存取值是由 列舉定義。Registry permission access values are defined by the enumeration. 下表會詳細說明其成員。The following table details its members. |值Value|登錄變數的存取權Access to Registry Variables| |-----------|----------------------------------| |AllAccessAllAccess|建立、讀取和寫入Create, read, and write| |建立Create|建立Create| |NoAccessNoAccess|沒有存取權。No access.| |讀取Read|讀取Read| |WriteWrite|WriteWrite| 下表列出包含工作的範例`My.Computer.Registry`物件。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Registry` object. |**若要****To**|**請參閱****See**| |------------|-------------| |建立登錄機碼，並設定其值Create a registry key and set its value|[如何：建立登錄機碼並設定其值How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)| |刪除登錄機碼Delete a registry key|[如何：刪除登錄機碼How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)| |讀取登錄機碼的值Read a value from a registry key|[如何：讀取登錄機碼的值How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)| ## Examples 這個範例會計算，並顯示登錄機碼中的值數目。This example counts and displays the number of values in the registry key. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#4)]
